description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员，奥运冠军，以其创新的直拍横打技术闻名。现任中国国家乒乓球队男队主教练。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player, Olympic champion, famous for his innovative reverse penhold backhand technique. Currently the head coach of the Chinese national men's table tennis team.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，是王皓的国籍国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, it is the nationality of Wang Hao.

description.zh-cn: 王皓的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Wang Hao.

nodes.id: 八一大商乒乓球俱乐部

zh-cn: 八一大商乒乓球俱乐部

description.zh-cn: 王皓于1999年至2014年效力的乒乓球俱乐部。
description.en: The table tennis club Wang Hao played for from 1999 to 2014.

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国参加国际乒乓球赛事的队伍，王皓曾为该队运动员，现任男队主教练。
description.en: The team representing the People's Republic of China in international table tennis competitions. Wang Hao was a player for this team and is currently the head coach of the men's team.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员，与王皓、王励勤并称“男乒三虎”，是王皓同时代的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player, known as one of the 'Three Tigers of Men's Table Tennis' along with Wang Hao and Wang Liqin, and one of Wang Hao's main contemporary rivals.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员，与王皓、马琳并称“男乒三虎”，是王皓同时代的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player, known as one of the 'Three Tigers of Men's Table Tennis' along with Wang Hao and Ma Lin, and one of Wang Hao's main contemporary rivals.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典乒乓球运动员。
description.en: Swedish table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 韩国男子乒乓球运动员。
description.en: South Korean male table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 德国男子乒乓球运动员。
description.en: German male table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国男子乒乓球运动员，王皓的队友。
description.en: Chinese male table tennis player, teammate of Wang Hao.

description.zh-cn: 中国舞蹈演员，王皓的妻子。
description.en: Chinese dancer, wife of Wang Hao.

description.zh-cn: 王皓与闫博雅的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Wang Hao and Yan Boya.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 八一大商乒乓球俱乐部

description.zh-cn: 王皓在1999年至2014年期间为八一大商乒乓球俱乐部的成员。
description.en: Wang Hao was a member of the Bayi Dashang Table Tennis Club from 1999 to 2014.

description.zh-cn: 王皓是中华人民共和国公民。
description.en: Wang Hao is a citizen of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 王皓出生于吉林省长春市。
description.en: Wang Hao was born in Changchun, Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 王皓自2022年12月29日起担任中国国家乒乓球队男队主教练。此前他长期作为该队运动员。
description.en: Wang Hao has been the head coach of the Chinese national men's table tennis team since December 29, 2022. He was previously a long-time player for the team.

description.zh-cn: 作为同时代的顶尖球员，王皓与马琳在多项赛事中既是队友也是对手。例如，王皓在2006年多哈亚运会男单决赛中击败马琳，但在2008年北京奥运会男单决赛中负于马琳。
description.en: As top players of the same era, Wang Hao and Ma Lin were both teammates and rivals in many competitions. For example, Wang Hao defeated Ma Lin in the men's singles final of the 2006 Doha Asian Games, but lost to Ma Lin in the men's singles final of the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 作为同时代的顶尖球员，王皓与王励勤在多项赛事中既是队友也是对手。例如，王皓在2005年全运会男单决赛中负于王励勤，但在2009年横滨世乒赛男单决赛中战胜王励勤夺冠。
description.en: As top players of the same era, Wang Hao and Wang Liqin were both teammates and rivals in many competitions. For example, Wang Hao lost to Wang Liqin in the men's singles final of the 2005 National Games, but defeated him in the men's singles final of the 2009 Yokohama World Championships to win the title.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年北京奥运会男子乒乓球单打半决赛上，王皓以4比1击败瑞典选手约尔根·佩尔森。
description.en: In the men's table tennis singles semi-final at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, Wang Hao defeated Swedish player Jörgen Persson 4-1.

description.zh-cn: 王皓与柳承敏在重大比赛决赛中多次交手，包括在2004年雅典奥运会男单决赛中负于对手，以及在2007年男单世界杯决赛中战胜对手。
description.en: Wang Hao and Ryu Seung-min faced each other in several major finals, including losing to him in the men's singles final of the 2004 Athens Olympics and defeating him in the men's singles final of the 2007 World Cup.

description.zh-cn: 王皓取代孔令辉获得2004年雅典奥运会参赛资格。两人在2005年世界乒乓球锦标赛中搭档获得男子双打冠军。
description.en: Wang Hao replaced Kong Linghui to qualify for the 2004 Athens Olympics. The two partnered to win the men's doubles title at the 2005 World Table Tennis Championships.

description.zh-cn: 王皓与德国选手蒂莫·波尔在职业生涯中多次交锋，例如在2005年男子乒乓球世界杯赛中负于对手，但在2007年和2008年的世界杯中均战胜对手夺冠。
description.en: Wang Hao competed against German player Timo Boll multiple times in his career, for example, losing to him in the 2005 Men's Table Tennis World Cup, but defeating him to win the title in the 2007 and 2008 World Cups.

description.zh-cn: 王皓与队友马龙多次交手，例如在2009年全运会决赛中击败马龙，以及在2010年亚运会决赛中负于马龙。两人也作为队友共同获得2012年伦敦奥运会男团冠军。
description.en: Wang Hao played against his teammate Ma Long multiple times, such as defeating him in the 2009 National Games final and losing to him in the 2010 Asian Games final. They also won the men's team gold together at the 2012 London Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 王皓在2011年世乒赛、2012年伦敦奥运会和2013年世乒赛的男单决赛中均负于队友张继科。两人也作为队友共同获得2012年伦敦奥运会男团冠军。
description.en: Wang Hao lost to his teammate Zhang Jike in the men's singles finals of the 2011 World Championships, the 2012 London Olympics, and the 2013 World Championships. They also won the men's team gold together at the 2012 London Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 王皓在队友郝帅为儿子举办的宴会上宣布退出国家队。
description.en: Wang Hao announced his retirement from the national team at a banquet held by his teammate Hao Shuai for his son.

description.zh-cn: 王皓于2013年与舞蹈演员闫博雅结婚。
description.en: Wang Hao married dancer Yan Boya in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 王睿庭是王皓的长子。
description.en: Wang Ruiting is the eldest son of Wang Hao.

description.zh-cn: 王睿庭是闫博雅的长子。
description.en: Wang Ruiting is the eldest son of Yan Boya.

description.zh-cn: 王皓是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Hao is a member of the Communist Party of China.
